text: xo phracea khxng rea thæcring kha phraxngkh di hı luk hlan khxng kha phraxngkh phanak xyu n thirab lum ni doy mimi phuch phl dı «sung xyu kıl ban xanpen khet hwngham khxng phraxngkh xo phracea khxng rea pheux hı phwk khea darng kar lahmad khx phraxngkh thrng hı citcı cak pwng mnusʹy mung pi yang phwk khea læa thrng prathan paccay yangchiph thi pen phuch phl kæ phwk khea pheux wa phwk khea ca khxbkhun
